list.emptyMessage: No categories are added. Click button to add new category.

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete a category?
deleteConfirm.title: Delete a category

form.limitedPermissionsHint: Only brand users can edit this field
form.addFrenchNameBtn: Add the service name in French
form.addFrenchDescriptionBtn: Add the service description in French

tax.label: Select type of tax
tax.tooltip: Only taxes assigned to a location will apply. Ex: if your New York location only has one tax rate, “City Tax,” and your London location has one tax rate, “VAT,” selecting both will only add the applicable tax rate depending on where the service is charged

locationsDefault.label: Default for all locations
locationsDefault.tooltip: These defaults will be automatically assigned to new locations and barbers. On the next “Assign Service” tab: services can be removed from locations and barbers. Additionally, these defaults can be overridden on a per shop or per barber basis.

onlineVisibility.label: Online visibility
onlineVisibility.tooltip: When enabled, this service will appear in your Booking Site and Embedded Widgets. This will not affect your ability to choose it when you create an appointment

requiresPrepaid.label: Requires prepaid
requiresPrepaid.tooltip: When enabled, this service will require your clients to pay before booking it

kiosk.label: Kiosk
kiosk.tooltip: Sliding this on allows walk-in clients to book this service at an iPad in your shop

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete a service?
deleteConfirm.title: Delete a service

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.fieldTooLong: Field must be at most ${max} characters
errors.fieldTooShort: Field must be at least ${min} characters
